nodes.description: 1999年9月9日莫斯科公寓爆炸，Alyona Morozova母亲在爆炸中丧生
nodes.support_text: Alyona Morozova didn't hear the bomb blast that took her mother's life. In the center of an explosion, a physicist explained to her later, there is silence: Sound waves spread out beyond the blast itself.

nodes.description: 爆炸后Alyona在废墟中寻找母亲并联系姐姐Tatyana，通过CNN找到在美国的Tatyana
nodes.support_text: She crawled through the dark to the windowsill, then waited. Some time later -- she doesn't know how long -- a blinding fire-truck searchlight landed on her. Even as she searched for two hours through the rubble for her mother, Alyona realized she had to call her sister in the United States.

nodes.description: 9月13日Kashirskoye Shosse公寓再次爆炸，9月16日Volgodonsk卡车炸弹袭击，总死亡人数达300人
nodes.support_text: Four days later, an apartment building on Kashirskoye Shosse was bombed. On Sept. 16, a truck bomb tore the facade off an apartment building in Volgodonsk, Rostov region. About 300 people were killed in total.

nodes.description: 姐妹移居美国，Alyona进入科罗拉多大学，但一年后开始怀疑官方恐怖袭击解释
nodes.support_text: Alyona joined Tatyana in the United States, then enrolled in the University of Colorado. It was not until almost a year later that the Morozova sisters began to doubt this second version of events, too.

nodes.description: 导演Nekrasov邀请Tatyana回俄拍摄纪录片《Disbelief》，Alyona接受采访但拒绝离美
nodes.support_text: When director Andrei Nekrasov told Alyona and Tatyana that he was planning a documentary questioning the circumstances of the bombings, and that he wanted them to return to Russia with a film crew, only Tatyana accepted.

nodes.description: 2004年9月23日《Disbelief》在莫斯科首映，随后举办追思会
nodes.support_text: On Wednesday, almost exactly five years after the first apartment bombing shook Russia, 'Disbelief' (Nedoveriye)... will play in a small theater in north Moscow followed by a midnight service.

nodes.description: 纪录片在瑞士等8国上映，瑞士收视率创纪录，Nekrasov被比作'俄罗斯迈克尔·摩尔'
nodes.support_text: The movie will play in eight countries this week. When it was shown on television in Switzerland last month, it got the kind of ratings normally reserved for a blockbuster thriller.

nodes.description: Berezovsky资助的《Assassination of Russia》在Sundance电影节首映，引发观众强烈反应
nodes.support_text: Comparing titles is telling. 'Disbelief' has... The Berezovsky-backed film is called 'The Assassination of Russia,' and is based on a book called 'The FSB Blow Up Russia.'

nodes.description: 9月22日Ryazan事件中FSB被曝用糖粉制造虚假恐袭，但未改变公众对第二次车臣战争的支持
nodes.support_text: As Russians panicked and organized vigilante squads to watch buildings, three sacks stuffed with white powder and connected to what appeared to be a detonator were discovered in a Ryazan basement on Sept. 22... The powder was sugar.

nodes.description: 导演Nekrasov的纪录片被盗窃，瑞士记者称其像'俄罗斯迈克尔·摩尔'
nodes.support_text: Nekrasov's documents were stolen from his jacket pocket on the day he was to fly out of Moscow. 'I felt like getting out of my car and screaming, 'What do you want from me?'
